website_summaries.verdict: Good size, good price, and excellent multi-speed performance in a wall fan.
pros: At an 18-inch diameter, this wall fan is a very popular size
Motor is completely enclosed to protect it from dust
Can adjust the fan speed with a pull chain
Includes a hanging bar that will sturdily support the weight of the fan
Fan head tilts for directed air flow
cons: Fan's cage will not stand up to rough treatment and may dent

customer_reviews.title: Ordered four of these and easily installed them myself high over the stalls
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the horror stories of box fans causing barn fires, I decided to replace ours with sealed motor fans. Ordered four of these and easily installed them myself high over the stalls. The fans are not exactly quite but they sure move a lot of air. I like them being up over the stalls, out of the way, they are nice looking (as far as fans go) and I like knowing the horse dust isn't going cause an issue in the motors. I'm pleased to have found and purchased these fans. Shipping from the seller was very fast. As for the noise levels of the fans, well, I don't sleep in the barn and the horses don't care.
customer_reviews.author: goldencrazy

customer_reviews.title: Superior fans and safe for our horses!
customer_reviews.text: Great fan! Super durable and I did not have to buy any special attachments! My horses said thank you during those hot humid fly nipping days! My horses would run to the barn if they saw me working inside and they actually galloped across the field to be let in to their stalls for the protection of the fans! Not only did the fans help my horses cool down, they actually kept those nasty biting flies off of them! No worries about fans heating up! Not a fire hazard!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis B

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: My horse feels like a VIP now. She has way less flies in her stall than her neighbors without fans. I have started grooming her in the stall on hot days so I can get some relief as well!! Great buy, I feel good knowing it is the safe kind of fan.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B. Faris

customer_reviews.title: Great fan and great price - quality product
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I knocked a star off is the for the up and down adjustment of the fan, It could use some tweaking to say the least. Other than that, installation was super easy and wow, this thing really moves the air. Noise level is what I expected and acceptable for the amount of air it moves. I installed this fan in my garage. Up north you deal with snow and ice but in Florida we deal with heat and humidity and this fan has definitely helped. I am debating on purchasing a second unit since my garage is so large but I would definitely recommend this fan for the amount of air it moves and the price.
customer_reviews.author: John W.

customer_reviews.title: Great ventilation fan for garage/home gym!
customer_reviews.text: This fan was PERFECT for my garage to hang from the storage rafters to help keep me cool during the summer since I have a home gym setup. Loved that the pull chain is long enough for any adult to easily reach despite it being mounted on the ceiling and has 3 different settings. I like that the low setting is relatively quiet and does not affect my ability to hear my TV which I watch during workouts. If you don't screw the lag bolt too tight, then you have the option to swivel the fan to face another direction as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Philip, San Jose CA

customer_reviews.title: good shop fan
customer_reviews.text: This fan will be a bit loud for some people, but that what I expected out of a fan that actually puts out air... and it does. I used mine on the ceiling, and set it up to pivot on a bolt. Works great
customer_reviews.author: Ashley B.

customer_reviews.title: We love them!!
customer_reviews.text: This is our 4th fan and they are awesome! Our patio is 40ft long so installed ceiling fans and in MS heat they are worthless. Installed these and now we can actually sit outside in the summer and feel a nice breeze!
customer_reviews.author: chris collins

customer_reviews.title: Big air moving for 18”’fan. A++++
customer_reviews.text: For an 18” fan I was extremely pleased of how much air it moved. The motor was quiet and the blades seem to have the exact pitch to create the perfect flow. 3 speeds and on high keeps my garage gym air flowing when it was 90 degrees outside. Heavy duty long cord and solid pull chain. However, I am plugging and unplugging the cord to tun on and off to minimize chain pull wear and tugging on the fan because it’s mounted on the ceiling. Definitely a good purchase. It’s a tad pricy but a cheap fan will give you cheap results.
customer_reviews.author: William L

customer_reviews.title: Well done so far.
customer_reviews.text: I had a small Honeywell cooler on the porch for the dog, and it was a disaster to maintain, pump went bad twice, pads were a pain to keep clean, then the fan motor died. Found the motor alone was almost $80 to replace. Bought this, put one of those misting rings on it (even had to plug 3 of the 4 misters) and it works WAY better than that cooler ever did, could be aimed where I needed it and cooled out to 15' in front of it on low!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent barn fans!
customer_reviews.text: Saw fans similar to these at a local farm supply retailer, but didn't buy instantly due to the price. Got online, researched, and found these here on Amazon for a lower price...and they were on sale! I bought four to replace dangerous box fans in my barn. They are easy to install, and the increased air flow is amazing! Variable speed, so when it cools off, I can reduce the speed, but still maintain air movement in the barn. The enclosed motor makes this fan a safer choice for a barn than a box fan. Have had these in the barn for about three weeks now and absolutely love them.
customer_reviews.author: D. S. Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great air flow. Quieter than expected
customer_reviews.text: Just got a chance to plug it in. Ended up mounting it to a $16 swivel tv mount from harbor freight so I could flip it around and use it as a hot air exhaust also. Great air flow at all 3 speeds. Much quieter than expected. Made is USA.. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Dale Shroyer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: June 2020 Update: Runs all day 24/7. Still working like new. Not a hitch yet. Bottom line: Does what it's supposed to do, built well. Received today. Contrary to product details, and images--product is black in color and did not come with hanging mount. Instructions that came with product recommend installing with lag screw and washer which are not included. All minor annoyances. Lastly, fan has three speed settings instead of the advertised two settings (High/Mid/Low).
customer_reviews.author: EmTeeDubya

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fan!  Powerful!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how great this fan is for the price! It's great quality and powerful blowing are awesome. There's not much difference between high and low but on a hot day this is fantastic. We also use it to improve drying time on painted projects. Seller even followed up after the delivery to make sure everything was ok. It's a great addition to our shop! Can be mounted on about anything, a pole, wall or ceiling in minutes. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: D. Deem

customer_reviews.title: Lasted just over 1 year - Support Line not in service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this fan for $55 and probably didn't run it for more than a couple hours per week over the last 15 months. The blade just snapped in half. I tried to call the manufacturers support line listed on my Amazon order and it is out of service. Can't find another listing. I did find the replacement blade on Amazon for this unit - which Maxx Air sells for $49. What a joke. Was planning to purchase 2 more of these for my pool area, but time to find another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Flexible installation; perfect for a 20 by 20' garage
customer_reviews.text: I mounted this on my open truss garage ceiling on one of the trusses. I used a lag bolt and two washers and some lube so I can turn the fan in any direction horizontally and up and down. The high is really high. The low speed could be a little lower. I knew about that from the description before I bought it and find it acceptable. No more summer sweats in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Objective

customer_reviews.title: Looks sturdy but product wasn’t made in the USA as touted proudly in its description!
customer_reviews.text: Product is made in China but is advertised as made in the USA. Other than the false advertising, the fan seems well made and hopefully will last.
customer_reviews.author: Luan C. Do

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly and installed easily
customer_reviews.text: 3-speed, seems sturdy, attached it to the ceiling using a swivel (3/8" wood screw, fender washers, rubber washers, and a 3/8" 2" extension) so it sits 2" below the ceiling and swivels with some friction to hold it from "walking". Haven't used it beyond simple testing, but it appears to be what I was looking for - a good fan at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Powerful fan
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 car garage to help circulate some air in this hot and humid heat of the south. I was worried about fans being too loud but this is not bad. I used an app on my cell phone to function as a decibel meter just to gain a little perspective. My garage was 33 db with everything off. The low, medium, and high db readings averaged across 10 seconds per speed: 54,57,60. This was measured about 6 linear feet away from the fan. All in all, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: LSU Fan

customer_reviews.title: I use this fan on my patio, in Florida ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this fan on my patio, in Florida, to beat the high humidity we live with. Others have commented about unacceptable noise levels but, I haven't had any issues with mine. It's hung from my ceiling on the patio and really moves some air. Although not rated for outdoor use, I have no issues and it's under the roof away from any possible rain.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Solid fan for not a whole lot of money. I have this installed in my garage where I have a home gym and workshop. I installed it with spacers so I could spin it around to point wherever I need it. It works great so far and I have faith in it being very useful in our Louisiana summers. Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: very little fan noise  with good air movement
customer_reviews.text: I have a limited amount of space, approximately 700SF for a 2 room woodworking shop. It can get hot and stuffy, however a fan with a lot of wind power is too much, but sometimes a hard blow is needed. Th Maxx Air HVWM Ceiling mounted fan offers 3 good speeds for air circulation with a comfortable quiet noise level. I've added a 2nd fan for to replace one in the smaller room. Great Fan for the $$$. Charles D. Welch
customer_reviews.author: Charles Welch

customer_reviews.title: Good workshop/garage fan
customer_reviews.text: Great fan for the workshop/garage. Not nearly as loud as some of the reviews have indicated but definitely too loud if you wanted to put in inside of a house and get some sleep. Cools off my workshop just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Steve D

customer_reviews.title: Good fan
customer_reviews.text: Bought this fan to mount under my shed roof so I don’t have to lug one out every time I need one. Like the adjustability, can get the air flow where I want it. Only problem I had was the cage was bent a little on one side in shipping. Just took it apart and bent it back in place. Puts out good air flow. Other reviews bitched about how loud it was but I don’t find it as loud as other fans I’ve had so I guess that’s a personal thing. Considering getting another to mount on the other side.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: High-output fan that can be used outdoors at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my horse stalls and absolutely love them! My stalls are 15 x 15 and these do an incredible job of helping to keep them cool. I have one mounted in each stall and even with temps above 100 degrees the shaded stalls with the fans are not uncomfortable to be in. The air circulation also helps to reduce the flies in the stalls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cooled Down on Hot Days In Garage
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband's two car garage and he loves it. He has it positioned by the bay where he works on his hobby car and it has helped a great deal on these extremely hot days this summer. It is not as loud as I thought based on some reviewers but, you do know that it is running; I expect certain noises are expected in a working garage such as air compressors, etc. It supplies great air flow and he likes that it came with the mounting bracket. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: P. Allen

customer_reviews.title: works well as an over door fan, at a much lower price than the "Air Curtain" fans designed for this purpose.
customer_reviews.text: I mounted this fan over my back sliding door. It keeps bugs out as well (or better) than my screen door did, and is significantly cheaper than the Air Curtain fans that are designed for this purpose. The noise vs fan power is well within acceptable. I find that the lower setting blows enough air to reach from the overhead, to the floor, while keeping the noise level reasonable, and very comparable to high quality blade fans of this size.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Keeney

customer_reviews.title: Great for barn stall
customer_reviews.text: Our stall just got way too hot. I installed this fan and run it about 7 hours a day in 95+ heat and it keeps the stall much cooler. She really appreciates it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr DT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fan, especally for the price!
customer_reviews.text: These fans are well built and can produce a large volume of air. I mounted these in my garage so I could work out these in the summer (I'm in the Coastal Bend area of Texas where it is always hot and humid). The two fans I bought make working in the garage tolerable. I can strongly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Lester

customer_reviews.title: Super solid air moving machine!
customer_reviews.text: We love this fan. You can tell it's sturdily built as soon as u open the box. It's a bit loud but only because it's moving so much air the motor is solid and quiet and it's well balanced so no ticks or chattering. I took the fan off the support and mounted just the support to the ceiling with Velcro strips under it to make it easier and to limit the transfer of vibration (noise) to the ceiling and then just remounted the fan to the bracket...I'm trying to talk my mom into getting one for their front porch I love it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... ago into my wood shop and keeps the shop nice and cool
customer_reviews.text: Mounted this fan months ago into my wood shop and keeps the shop nice and cool. Since I'm in a shop the noise isn't an issue so can't comment on that but to me its not noticeable. It will move air and thats why i give it a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Copperfield

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for horse stalls!
customer_reviews.text: This enclosed motor is what I was looking for to put into my horses stalls. The noise isn’t any louder than a box fan. The air circulation is great, I’ve only put it on low (3 speeds). I installed the fans myself and it was pretty easy. I originally purchased 2 to test and immediately purchased 3 more!
customer_reviews.author: Aimee R. Pahl

customer_reviews.title: solid fan for barn!
customer_reviews.text: Sealed motor is way to go for dusty areas. Easy to install and fan is powerful too. Rarely turn it over medium. Get it, your horse will enjoy it!
customer_reviews.author: ~~Joe~~

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fan
customer_reviews.text: Love this fan.. pulls a lot of air. Hung it in the barn over the tack room.
customer_reviews.author: Renegade

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan for my Horse Stalls
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 4 of these fans after reading other reviews that they were installed in barn stalls; as they are listed residential for patios and porches. These really move the air and were relatively easy to install. Another reviewer advised that if you remove the bracket from the fan it would make installation easier. We did that and yes that made things easier. They come with a lengthy power cord and an attached Velcro strap for the excess cord which I found handy. The only downside is when I'm cleaning my stalls, I get dust in my eyes, even when the fan is on low. My horses are definitely happier and so am I.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Fan
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the airflow and ease of mounting with this fan. Also bought a similar Air King fan and it is pathetic.
customer_reviews.author: J. G. Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I installed this in my garage, which is not climate-controlled but serves a dual purpose as a workshop and home gym. Installing it is slightly finicky since the fan itself partly blocks the mounting holes on the bracket, but it's not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Eoban Binder

customer_reviews.title: Terrific fan for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have three different models of closed motor fans from three different manufacturers. Of the three, this brand/model is by far my favorite. The air output is much better than the ones I purchased from Tractor Supply and Northern Tool. Also, the cost is much less. I am using them above the stalls in my horse barn.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shop Fan
customer_reviews.text: Solid buy. I put this up in the garage and ran it for months with no problems. Can ceiling or wall mount. Sturdy construction that I highly recommend. It’s a fan, and pushing air makes noise but this is no greater than expected. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Fan blades installed backwards.
customer_reviews.text: Love this fan but the fan blades were installed backwards. When compared to a previous fan I purchased a few months ago, the new fan was noisier and blew less air. I compared the two and saw the blades reversed on the new model. I removed five screws, removed the front fan shroud, loosened the fan set screw and flipped the blades over. Now it works as it should. Who knows how many were assembled in this way.
customer_reviews.author: Scott H.

customer_reviews.title: Made in USA. Excellent volume of air.
customer_reviews.text: Blows a amazing amount of air for it’s size. Love the fact that it’s made in U.S.A. I waited a month or so to review to see if it holds up. So far so good. I hung mine a little different as you can see.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: surprising quality
customer_reviews.text: For being so cheap, this fan is more powerful than I was expecting. I use it to circulate air in my garage, particularly from the gas heater. I use it on the lowest setting for the heat, and it pumps the heated through my 2 car garage in about 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Van Swol

customer_reviews.title: This is a serious fan
customer_reviews.text: I installed this on the ceiling of my garage gym with a single lag bolt. Didn't tighten it all the way so I can easily rotate the fan to point directly at me, no matter where I am. It's a bit loud, but what do you expect, it moves a LOT of air! Very pleased with this fan, definitely one of the best additions I've made to the home gym.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to install with two people. The bolts that hold the fan to the mounting, tend to fall inside the fan casing while hooking the fan back to the mounting frame. It was a fairly easy fix to take the front of the fan off and reset the bolts but it took two sets of hands to install. The fan works great with three settings and the amount of airflow is great. We have two on our 25x16 porch and the fans keep the air moving and the temperature tolerable during August in south Georgia with 90+ degree days.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia M.

customer_reviews.title: Works fine but check the blades quality control is low.
customer_reviews.text: So the fan works good my only issue was the fan blade was installed backwards.
customer_reviews.author: mbull

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! Keeps the bugs off my horse
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these and installed them in my horse's run-in shed. He basically hides in the run-in under the fans all summer (I live on a lake where it is buggy). There is some noise, but it's not annoying, i.e. pitch or squeaky. It's just a loud hum. And, they are great to cool down under too! They do create a lot of dust accumulation in corner and such. But, I love these fans! I am so glad I spent the money to upgrade rather than buy another set of the $20 Walmart window fans.
customer_reviews.author: Mwroebot

customer_reviews.title: Enclosed motor
customer_reviews.text: My husband put this in my horses stall, very hot in Florida even at night. Seems to work very well. I like it cause when I clean stall give me some nice air. Helps keep the flies and mosquitoes down at night when she is in.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Good barn fan
customer_reviews.text: I waited to review this because I wanted to put it in my barn and see if it would last. It is a sturdy outdoor fan. I only wish I had bought a 20" for my 12x16 stall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes our stifling garage more enjoyable!
customer_reviews.text: Great product love that the motor is covered. I love the lull of a fan so the noise is super comforting to me. We typically use the lowest speed and it is great in our garage. Has made it much more pleasant in an otherwise stifling garage in Florida! Easy to mount on shelving! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: jr05

customer_reviews.title: Used in my greenhouse
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these to install at each end of my greenhouse. Very easy to install using the bracket supplied. I am impressed by how much air these can move. I have had the two up and running for almost 3 months, in a very humid environment, and they seem to be operating and look like new still. No signs of rust or corrosion of any sort.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher R.

customer_reviews.title: Great fan for horse stalls!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding fan! We ordered four for our horse stalls. This was easy to install. It’s reassuring the motor is enclosed to protect from dust. I don’t find the noise level to be too annoying. Most fans make some noise. The air output is outstanding. We currently have the fans at the lowest level and the air movement is great! The company was also excellent to work with!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan it helps keep me cool while I work in our garage in the summertime. It blows a little to hard but I always turn it to low and I'm good to go and it isn't too loud either. I work in a dusty environment so it's great that it is a sealed unit. I expect it to last for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This thing has power! It’s very small and emits a lot more air than I thought possible. Use it in my home gym (aka garage) in Texas heat and it does the job. Might need to get a second one for the back porch!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Good airflow and not too noisy in my garage
customer_reviews.text: Good airflow and not too noisy in my garage. Have it ceiling mounted with one bolt so I can swivel it wherever I need the air. So far so good. Don't really like where the pull chain lands when it's ceiling mounted, but can't complain too much.
customer_reviews.author: Some guy in TX

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for barn or stable...
customer_reviews.text: Great fan. We installed in our horses stall and it circulates and moves air. We are in south Florida and it is powerful enough to keep horse cool and keep bugs off.
customer_reviews.author: Kickinupsand

customer_reviews.title: Dead right out the box
customer_reviews.text: Bad idea - Got a warehouse deal, saved a few dollars. Dead out of the box, I did notice the lack of the orange inspection sticker warehouse deals usually have, I guess they just shipped me a returned one that didn't work, needed it this Easter weekend. Big disappointment should have bought a local one
customer_reviews.author: HotRodMark

customer_reviews.title: Not made in USA
customer_reviews.text: Listing claims made in USA. Product is marked made in china.
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan for Garage
customer_reviews.text: The fan is used in our garage and is very powerful plus quiet ! The only challenge was mounting it to the ceiling in the garage it is difficult to reconnect the bracket back to the fan/cage.
customer_reviews.author: Gone shopping 4 u

customer_reviews.title: Good buy..
customer_reviews.text: Very nice unit. 100% Satisfied, I have a large floor fan same brand. Been using it outside for 6yrs. Great company with industrial strength products.
customer_reviews.author: alexander j vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional fan
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fan for my shed. Moves a lot of air and it sounds great. Definitely not cheaply made. So happy with it I bought another one for my garage
customer_reviews.author: dmiami123

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fan for exercise area
customer_reviews.text: I mounted this fan in my garage exercise area. It has three speeds, appears well built, runs well, and reasonably quiet. It is perfect for my use.
customer_reviews.author: Windknot54

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: The fan is durable and well made, I have no doubt it will last a long time. The 3 speeds give good flexibility. I wish the fan could swivel up/down and left/right but otherwise is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: I mounted this fan in my greenhouse and it works very well with the orchids growing there. Noise level is a bit high, thus the noise rating. Also the blades aren't perfectly balanced, so there's some minor shake--thus the mark on sturdiness.
customer_reviews.author: JA Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great product, need to work on packaging
customer_reviews.text: Fan should have been returned based on how it was received, but luckily I'm somewhat handy and straighten out the grill, which came dented. Company needs to invest more materials in the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M.

customer_reviews.title: Maxx Air Wall Mount Fan, Commercial Grade for Patio, Garage,
customer_reviews.text: we did a garage conversion work shop and it was hot during the summer so much we needed to do something. this fan is perfect. would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie Mason sells real estate

customer_reviews.title: moves a lot of air
customer_reviews.text: very sloid fan. am very pleased with it. the only down side is the guard was bent in transit, I needed the fan immediately, so I straightened it. now it works flawlessly
customer_reviews.author: James W.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and moves a lot of air.
customer_reviews.text: I like how the mounting bracket works. You can get a combination angle between the bracket angle and the pivot angle of the fan. Works perfect. Moves a lot of air. Using it for garage floor fan to dry moisture in heated garage. Snow melt off of two vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Zac

customer_reviews.title: Good outdoor fan
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this fan for my horse to be used with a misting ring. Works very well, and is safe around the barn. My horse is very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: heidismutti

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my garage
customer_reviews.text: I installed this in my garage to keep me cool when working out. Even on low, it produces a huge amount of air. It has a long cord that I can easily reach, and was easily attached to the ceiling. I was pleasantly surprised at how effective it was. Great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Great fan for $
customer_reviews.text: Love this fan, bought it for my garage gym. It is loud, but powerful. I generally keep it on low. I mounted mine to 1/2" osb with a 3/8ths eye hook, two lock washers and a wing nut. I am able to "swivel" using this method to point the fan where I want air flow. Love it. Follow up email from their customer service too, to check on my satisfaction which was unexpected and awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan H

customer_reviews.title: Great for the stable
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and safe in the stable (doesn't get dust in the motor housing). Recommend if you have a stable
customer_reviews.author: Eaglescout75

customer_reviews.title: Fan blade backwards
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these fans. The first one did not put out much air. I discovered that the fan blades had been installed backwards. The set screw should be on the side toward the motor. Otherwise great fans. They move a lot of air and only use 80 watts compared to 114 to 132 watts for some other fans I have been using which moved about the same amount of air.
customer_reviews.author: Myron Horst

customer_reviews.title: Perfect outdoor fan
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this fan to Install in our back yard patio area. It gives off so much breeze it is keeping the mosquitos away!! Greatest purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jim McEachern

customer_reviews.title: Hell yes
customer_reviews.text: Hell yes to this fan. Bought this to mount on a screened in porch. Makes being outside in 100% humidity more bearable.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for a double kitchen in Palm Springs. It gets really hot during the summer and this fan is wonderful for moving the air around. It's good enough at the lowest speed that we keep it there, most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: Love the fan. Moves lots of air. Easy install and easy to use. Put on 16x16 screened in deck. Really great addition. Puts out alittle noise but all fans do. We'll made with true metal parts. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Laurin baker

customer_reviews.title: Nice fan. Its built well
customer_reviews.text: Nice fan. Its built well, and pushes massive amounts of air. Its quite enough when on low mode to work next to the fan and still hear people talking. If you kick it up to med or high the air sounds pick up to the point where hearing is muffled, however the air output is voluminous.
customer_reviews.author: aces2splash

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the horse barn
customer_reviews.text: I purchased six of these fans for my horse barn two years ago. All of them are still running perfectly. They were very easy to mount above each stall and provide plenty of air flow to keep horses cool and the flies at bay. Inexpensive and very durable. I just dust them off in early spring and turn them on. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: B. Pugh

customer_reviews.title: Huge price reduction right after I bought it. Ugh
customer_reviews.text: Excellent garage fan for the wall. It's pretty powerful and perfect size but wished I had waited 2 days to order as huge price reduction. Arrived one day early via fed ex! 5 star for the cheaper price!!
customer_reviews.author: CatDaddy & Biatch

customer_reviews.title: Shop fan
customer_reviews.text: We use In our shop and it works great moves lots of air and is very quiet for how good it works
customer_reviews.author: dianeb

customer_reviews.title: Works but gets hot
customer_reviews.text: This fan has worked well but the back gets very hot so it makes me nervous. We have other fans that don’t get that hot. But no problems...I’m just scared to leave it running too long.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Quite, powerful and efficient
customer_reviews.text: Mounted on my garage ceiling and it works as advertised. Even integrated the outlet with a smart plug so I can have Alexa control its operation.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love our fans. Installed in our barn for each of our horses.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia C. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Attach anywhere
customer_reviews.text: Nice powerful fans. It is difficult to find these in stores, of course amazon has them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D

customer_reviews.title: Quality fan
customer_reviews.text: Ceiling mounted, been running 4 months, works great, it moves a lot of air.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Sealed motor is great for barn
customer_reviews.text: Fan is for horse stalls. Moves air well. Sealed motor is great for barn.
customer_reviews.author: randy shoemake

customer_reviews.title: A bit noisy, but moves a lot of air
customer_reviews.text: Installed two of these on the rafters in the garage - they only swivel one direction, so you can't point them in all directions once they are mounted. Makes a bit of noise, but the air movement is good.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Great for horse stalls
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Moves plenty of air in my stalls. Safer with the enclosed motor.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Cool critters
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Using it in our barn to keep animals cool.
customer_reviews.author: K. Callan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy
customer_reviews.text: Works great for a large area, definitely buying another one .
customer_reviews.author: juvenal

customer_reviews.title: If you have a horse — get this fan!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fan for the horse stall! Best fan I’ve bought so far!
customer_reviews.author: Bonblast

customer_reviews.title: Great fan for the money...
customer_reviews.text: Fan was smaller than I anticipated but puts out quite a bit of air flow. I recommend for any small area like a two car garage size.
customer_reviews.author: Tavia Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: This fan was a nice addition to our home gym. It doesn’t move as much CFM as I had anticipated, but still worth the cost. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jason O.

customer_reviews.title: Nice fan
customer_reviews.text: Great garage fan. Attached to the ceiling and it blows well.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Trip to the Home Depot
customer_reviews.text: Make a run to the Home Depot... you need to buy your own bolts! But once it wAs hung it was great. Sturdy and puts out A LOT of wind! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Turbo - ATX

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet fan.  Great value.
customer_reviews.text: I’m in a 15 stall barn and this is the quietest fan there. Provides plenty of air movement.
customer_reviews.author: Nora Fischbach

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: I have seven of these up in the barn, the horses love them! I only run them on low and they provide a great breeze to keep flies away and horses cool.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: love them and safe for barns unlike box
customer_reviews.text: I have 8 in my barn.. some are 2yrs old.. love them and safe for barns unlike box fans
customer_reviews.author: perry palumbo

customer_reviews.title: Noise and Speed
customer_reviews.text: It is way quieter than I thought it might be. Have the same size from a differant company, its noisier and can't slow it down. I like the speeds, noise leval, looks like a good fan!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Linn

customer_reviews.title: Great product; easy to install and good value :-)
customer_reviews.text: Great product; easy to install and good value :-) It took me 20 minutes to install this fan for the outside patio and it looks and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, very quiet.
customer_reviews.text: After reading some reviews I was worried about the noise level. I bought two of them for my garage and am happy to report they are very quiet for the amount of air they move. Much easier to install than ceiling fans, which was my first inclination.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Zane Kline

product_meta.title: Maxx Air Wall Mount Fan, Commercial Grade for Patio, Garage, Shop, Easy Operation and Powerful CFM (18" Residential Wall Mount)
product_meta.description:
Style:18" Residential Wall MountThis 18-inch wall mount fan is a great choice for barns, workshops or garages. This fan can be wall-mounted or a hanging fan where floor space is limited, when overhead circulation is required and for harsh indoor environments. 

It features totally enclosed, dust proof, energy efficient PSC motor - 120 volt, 60Hz and 0.7 Amps. It has a 3-speed pull chain, rugged hanging bar and the fan head tilts 180 degrees. It is made of powder-coated steel, OSHA compliant rust resistant grilles and a 10-foot cord. 

Installing this MaxxAir HVWM18UPS High Velocity 18 inch Wall Mount Fan is easy. Along with the 18" fan head that tilts 180 degrees, this purchase includes a rugged hanging bar for quick setup and near immediate use.
feature_bullets: EXTREME OUTPUT - This is not your typical cheap wall mount fan. Made from rugged steel and built to last. This wallmount fan takes care of all your air circulation needs.
EASY TO USE - With new frustration free packaging and easy assembly you will be using your new air circulator / wall-mount fan as quick as you can open the box.
RUGGED - Powder coated steel construction, premium motors, and tough quality.
SAFETY FIRST - OSHA compliant grills, 10 foot grounded power cords, 180 degree tilt capability.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars580 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
